about_the_game:
Rent's Due: The Game is a third-person platformer game where you take control of protagonist Tesha Robinson. Tesha is in need of some money and in order to get enough, she has to complete different levels with different obstacles that provide a huge challenge. The Game will feature 30 levels with 3 modes, Normal, Permadeath & Troll Mode.

Normal Mode:

Normal Mode is the standard difficulty for playing Rent's Due: The Game. This mode offers the ability to go through levels without the fear of restarting by using a checkpoint system. Every time you fail during a level you will be respawned at the last checkpoint you passed through.

Permadeath Mode:

Permadeath mode will feature the same levels as Normal Mode. However, the big difference is Permadeath mode has no checkpoint system, and no matter what level you are on if you fail, you will restart the game from Level 1. This mode is recommended after playing through normal mode first so that you are familiar with the mechanics and controls.

Troll Mode:

Troll Mode features 6 playable levels where things are not what they seem. Traps will act differently, even the money will act differently on some occasions. So pay attention and you should be fine!

highlighted.name: Beat at least 22 Levels of Permadeath Mode.

However, the big difference is Permadeath mode has no checkpoint system, and no matter what level you are on if you fail, you will restart the game from Level 1. This mode is recommended after playing through normal mode first so that you are familiar with the mechanics and controls.

Troll Mode features 6 playable levels where things are not what they seem. Traps will act differently, even the money will act differently on some occasions. So pay attention and you should be fine!

name: Rent's Due: The Game

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core I3-4350 @3.6GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050Ti 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game features controller support only in gameplay but not for UI.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 - 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core I7-7700 @ 3.6GHz
  • Memory: 10 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1080 8GB - For 1080P60+FPS @Epic Settings
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game features controller support only in gameplay but not for UI.

short_description: Rent's Due: The Game is a third-person platformer game where you take control of protagonist Tesha Robinson. Tesha is in need of some money and in order to get it, she must complete different levels with various obstacles that provide a huge challenge.
